author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...TROPICAL DEPRESSION THREE-E DEVELOPS WELL SOUTHWEST OF THE COAST OF SOUTHWESTERN MEXICO...
summary: ...TROPICAL DEPRESSION THREE-E DEVELOPS WELL SOUTHWEST OF THE COAST OF SOUTHWESTERN MEXICO... As of 8:00 AM MST Sun Jun 08 the center of Three-E was located near 12.6, -110.6 with movement NW at 8 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1001 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 35 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...TROPICAL DEPRESSION THREE-E DEVELOPS WELL SOUTHWEST OF THE COAST OF SOUTHWESTERN MEXICO... As of 8:00 AM MST Sun Jun 08 the center of Three-E was located near 12.6, -110.6 with movement NW at 8 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1001 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 35 mph.

title: Summary for Tropical Depression Three-E (EP3/EP032025)
